__e: After that, there's no excuses, is there, buddy?
I don't want to know any more excuses or lies or anything that tells me anything other than the way I know it went down.
Because I finally got what I always wanted... and I've no excuses anymore.
Just-just hear me out, I need to talk to you about Louis.
Some agents of mine will be delivering it this very evening, and will you please let me finish?
No, let me finish, I've waited too long
Jim keeps making excuses for him, but if he needs help, I want to give it to him.
Making excuses for things I've done in the past?
If I were you, I wouldn't find so many excuses to do so many wrong things.

Well, if you'd let me finish, I think all your questions will be answered.

As a favor to me-- to please hear him out.
I'm not here to make excuses.
